Q_NAME: Count number of ways to jump to reach end
Q_DESC: Given an array of numbers where each element represents the max number of jumps that can be made forward from that element. For each array element, count number of ways jumps can be made from that element to reach the end of the array. If an element is 0, then move cannot be made through that element. The element that cannot reach to the end should have a count -1.
